description.code:
Sweet melodies played on analogue synthesizers, haunted tape delays, a slice of weird pop and tons of plunedrophonic fun in between. Bit of classic stuff, but mostly a work of present artists recalling moods from the early era of the electronic music.

Special thanks: Pete Um, Peter Olof Fransson, Matthew Davies, Simone Brillarelli.

Ubunoir
